Very fun game, slightly buggy, and the connection you have is based off of the killer, so if the killer is lagging the whole game is going to lag. The game is much more fun to play with friends as well. A few things could change to make the game better and more of a finished product, but its overall very good. 8/10

Dead by Daylight is a survival horror game where you can play as either a Survior or a Killer. As a survivor, you'r task is to group up with 3 others to turn on the 5 generators in the map, these generators power the 2 exits that you need to escape, the catch is however, is that one of the Killers is out to stop you and to sacrafise you to his demon overlord, these killers have different abilities and thus the survivor must be willing to run away when the killer is coming, or hide; when running, you can jump over obsticles, but don't let the killer catch you or he/she will throw you over their shoulder. 
The game implements this gameplay very well considering the price point; the graphics are pretty good and for mostly, the game is fair;however, there are issues with rendering on some peoples graphics cards and the occassional bug that arrises. Most of the complaints that come from this game are from other players and not the type of development. In older versions, there were issues with the time it took to level up, but the developers are adjusting settings in order to make it easier to get to a higher level. Overall, I would rate this game to be a 8/10. Good for the price .

This is probably one of the funniest yet rageist game i've played in a while. You can have loads of fun recking the killer or just killing the survivors or get totally recked and rage quit like me. I've broken some of my equipment while playing this game (anger issues :^) but i always keep coming back to it just because it got that nice feeling. If you're wondering if you should buy the game, do it! its super fun but do it if you already have some friends playing it cuz its not very fun playing solo with retards. <3

Am anfang hat es echt seine zeitgebraucht um mit DBD warm zu werden aber wenn mann einmal richtig versteht wie das spiel funktioniert hat es echtes suchtpotenzial es macht echt spaß entweder als killer oder als überlebender auf den sehr athmospherischen maps versuchen zu Entkommen oder zu Töten bei den einen oder anderen mal erschreckt man sich auch ziemlich (Michael Myers ;D) Aber ich kann jeden das spiel nur ans Herz legen es macht echt Sehr viel Spaß acuh wenn man mit Random leuten Spielt waren sie bis jetzt immer sehr Hilfreich und haben immer geholfen und einen geeilt wenn man verletzt war ich würde dem spiel an sich 8/10 punkten geben die restlichen 2 punkte kann man noch aufholen z.b mit Erweiterten Grafik einstellungen oder dass man nur die musik aus machen kann ohne gleich den kompletten ton aus zu machen

Смерть-не "НАЙТИ ВЫЙТИ".
Да. Все именно так. Смерть в этой игре не является выходом, это-лишь цикл. 
Цикл, который ведет лишь к одному, но разными путями.
Умрешь на крюке, добьет маньяк или же, счастливчик, ты сбежишь в открытые ворота, наслаждаясь разочарованием и гневом маньяка.... Но придется вернуться обратно.
Я тебе уже говорил, что такое безумие? Многократное повторение одного и того же действия в надежде на изменение...
Как бы не так!
Безумие, это-огромное колличество багов и недоработок в этой игре, безумие-толпы школьников, хейтеров, слабоумных людей, которые портят комьюнити.
Но в то же время... Безумие-огромное желание вернуться в этот мир крови, смерти и ощущения безысходности...
Ведь... Обернись-маньяк уже наблюдает за тобой.
Бойся. Сущность тебя не отпустит!

It is truly a great game, and a lot of fun to play with friends since they added the survive together option. The only complaints I have are not enough map variants or maps themselves, and the fact that a camping killer is impossible to defeat. It has created a community that either chooses to honor the code of no camping for a fun game for everyone or a horrible experience for the survivors. But I guess that's the point of not getting caught by the killer eh?

Game is still fun all these years later; however, this whole stranger things fiasco is ridiculous and the survivor/killer balance does not exist.

Dead by Daylight ist ein sehr spaßiges Spiel. Der Nervenkitzel, wenn der Killer einem am Hintern klebt ist einfach super. Mit ein paar Kumpels mit, oder gegen einen, ist es der doppelte Spaß. Definitiv eine Empfehlung wert!

I've owned this game since launch, and I still love it. It's a gruesome, asymetrical hide and seek game. The devs are constantly releasing updates to tweak the balance of both sides or fix bugs, and communicate weekly- sometimes daily with the community. There is a great variety of killers with unique skillsets, and a variety of survivors with endless combinations of perks to choose from to help you survive. Games are great for quick-fixes with matches typically lasting 5-15mins. The only thing the game suffers from is a vocal, toxic player base, but this is easily avoided by closing post game chat and avoiding the forums.

This game is awesome. Ignore the people complaining about individual mechanics and stuff like that. The devs are constantly updating the game with patches and gameplay tweaks alike, and for as long as I've been playing the game (a long time) I have always been able to escape as a survivor or kill as a killer. If you're looking for a different kind of multiplayer experience, then this is the game for you.
